title: Sulphur man kills 4-year-old, then himself after posting on Facebook
content:
A 59-year-old Sulphur man killed his 4-year-old son and then himself on Sunday night after posting his plans on Facebook, according to information from the Calcasieu Parish Sheriff's Office.
Sheriff's deputies were tipped off to Kenneth Bacque's post around 10:30 p.m. When they arrived at his home on Dahlia Lane, deputies found Bacque's and his son's bodies in a bedroom.
Bacque fatally shot his son before killing himself, according to the sheriff's office.
